markdownRemark.html:
Ning Liu

  • 👦 My name is Ning Liu. I was born in China and recently moved to the United States.
  • 💡 I am familiar with popular technology stacks such as Docker, Kubernetes, Istio, and Service

Mesh. Also, I am a Golang and PHP programmer. Although I have seniority experience in backend development, I graduated with a major in Advertising Design 12 years ago.

  • 👨‍🎓 To be a profound experience with ten years of full-time web development and architecture design, I am committed to taking responsibility for my project to produce efficient, stable, and graceful back-end service.
  • ⚡ I enjoy promoting and organizing teams to share technology to build a technical-sharing atmosphere. I am often active in presentations at the company's back-end and front-end conferences.
